QuestData.Title: Lurkers
QuestData.Description: Dis be a dangerous place, boss-mon.$b$bFilled with big monsters and savage giants.$b$bWell, like my family loa say, 'If ya can't beat it, poison it.'$b$BWe gonna be needin' some venom from the lurkers out there on the Cracking Plains. Dem lurkers be mighty sneaky, and mighty creepy. Be watchin the ground for rumbles and shakes.$b$bI'll be stayin' here to make a cure in case you accidentally get too poisoned.
QuestData.RewardText: Dem centipedes creep you out boss-mon? Touchin' ya with their teeny tiny legs? I ain't thought of a thing that makes me skin crawl more, except maybe mah sister's voice. Hee hee.
